column1: Deleting your account will permanently erase your customer data and access to all personal information from our site.
column2: A exclusão de sua conta apagará permanentemente seus dados de cliente e acesso a todas as informações pessoais do marketplace.

column1: We take your privacy extremely seriously. This policy describes what, why and how we collect and use your personal information, how we protect it and how you can contact us.
column2: Levamos sua privacidade extremamente a sério. Esta política descreve o que, por que e como coletamos e usamos suas informações pessoais, como as protegemos e como você pode entrar em contato conosco.

column1: Thank you for your order from %store_name.
column2: Thank you for your order from %store_name.

column1: You can check the status of your order by logging into your account.
column2: You can check the status of your order by logging into your account.

column1: If you have questions about your order, you can email us at %store_email.
column2: If you have questions about your order, you can email us at %store_email.

column2: Your order #%increment_id has been updated with a status of %order_status.
